thread.title: SeaWorld - Free Annual Pass + 2 Single Guest Passes for Teachers in CA, AZ, FL, (TX possibly)
thread.title_full: SeaWorld - Free Annual Pass + 2 Single Guest Passes for Teachers in CA, AZ, FL, (TX possibly)

author: someone03
title: SeaWorld - Free Annual Pass + 2 Single Guest Passes for Teachers in CA, AZ, FL, (TX possibly)
text: Threads Started SeaWorld Free Teacher Fun Card (Annual Pass) + 2 Single Guest Passes for Teachers in CA, AZ, FL, and possibly TX (if they renewed it for 2017). You have to register using your teaching credential number (e.g. CTC document number for CA). Also works for other educators with school credentials (Speech-Language Pathologists, School Psychologists, etc.). Private school classroom teachers require additional documentation.
